title: Design for irrigation. [Parts 1 & 2]
brief_description: Shows that a proper plan of irrigation is essential when planting new orchads. The example in the film is a new block of slightly sloping land which is to be planted with fruit trees. A model of the block shows the contours, and the method of ploughing, irrigation and planing which should be carried out in relation to the contour lines.
